item.title: Java 22 Features
item.description: Java 22 Features Unamed variables Now with Java 22 we an crate unname varibles. Earlier versions of java has few rules for variables like it should start with a letter, numbers not allowed as vairable names etc. In java 22 you can use _ as a variable name, but you can’t do any operations on it Check example below Student _ = new Student(); But you cant call any methods on that student object, for e.
